question:
Consider the following statements:
  1. Ganga basin is the single largest irrigated area in the world
  2. Siachen Glacier is the second longest glacier outside of the Polar Regions
Which among the above is / are correct?
explanation: Indus Valley in Pakistan is the largest single irrigated area on Earth, covering around 9X10<sup>6</sup> hactares. Siachen Glacier is the second longest glacier outside of the polar regions and largest in the Himalayas-Karakoram region.
